item.title: HD Wallpaper Minecraft Nether Portal 1920 x 1080
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:3, topic:425261”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=527924.msg3849363#msg3849363 date=1323898976]
Lighting needs A LOT of work, it’s really not believable right now.
[/quote]

Actually, this is set in an afternoon as i said I need work on shadows which may be the ‘unbelievable’ part to it, I had made the nether portal like that on purpose, again, as I stated above the shadows need work which is the problem with the lighting I am new to lighting types so stop acting so negative about it, infact stop acting so negative to any post on my topics.[/quote]
He means the way shadows are cast. Its to far from HD type minecraft still. Try for more of an ambient look.

Read full topic
